lead_paragraph: Team Europe have faced long odds from the start of the World Cup of Hockey but they just got longer as they must sweep mighty Canada over the last two games of the best-of-three final to clinch the title.

headline.print_headline: Team Europe Looking for 'Miracle' in World Cup Final
headline.main: Team Europe Looking for 'Miracle' in World Cup Final
